events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Customer issue identified as a refund request due to receiving incorrect product shipment.
Assigning the case to refund specialist team for further assistance and processing.
Hello, I am here to help you with your refund request regarding the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received for verification?
Thanks for responding so quickly. My order number is 123456789, and I have attached the photo you requested.
We have confirmed the error and will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate the quick resolution and look forward to receiving the refund.
Your refund is now processed. Please allow a few days for the transaction to appear on your statement.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund successfully and if you need further assistance.
Since the refund has been confirmed, we will now close this case. Please contact us if you have any other issues.
